title: (x) "World" compact Bauhaus-like sans caps - (similar to) Chalet Comprimé {Yves}
content:
T'ain't it purty? Too bad I have no idea what font it is.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [world.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415120658/http:/typophile.com/files/world.jpg) | 7.02 KB |
author: juno10

comments.content: How old is the sample? It seems pre-digital. First font I think of is [Tourist Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415120658/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/lanston_type/ltc_tourist_gothic_alternate/?sample_text=WORLD&sample_size=96&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1), but it doesn't have the DINesque 'O'.
Has kind of a WPA-era poster feel.

You can get _really_ close by combining different variations of [Chalet Comprimé Cologne](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415120658/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=11&subpage=viewfonts).
I'm sure it's not hand-lettered. I think I'll be picking up Chalet Comprimé Cologne this weekend.
